## Getting and Cleaning Data Course Project

- This is the course project for the above-mentioned Coursera course.
- The purpose of this project is to demonstrate your ability to collect, work with, and clean a data set.
- Script is called "run_analysis.R".
- Information about the script and dataset can be found in "CodeBook.Rmd"
